title: Nursing Practical Competency Enhancement: Educational Program for Developing a Mobile Islamic Banking Terminology Glossary App

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Islamic banking concepts and intermediate-level expertise in finance
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Can define core terminology in Islamic banking and finance in multiple languages (Malay-Arabic-English)
The mobile app design process can be explained using a rapid prototyping development model
The core features of a terminology explanation app can be designed based on user requirements analysis
A practical mobile learning tool can be developed through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
